With my full authority as a piano teacher for 10+ years, I deem this a legit banger.

This is bullshit.

That normal life is because US military spending protects Europe.

That ‚Äúnormal life‚Äù in Spain is being subsidized by the US because you don‚Äôt spend on all your own militaries.

This hits hard and the bridge is nuts.

What do you think?
The responses are priceless. You can spell it our in crayon üñç and you'll still get the group thinking its the rich.

The real issue is people believing the same assholes that created this spending problem are the same assholes capable of getting us out of it. 

Our world is full of beggars waiting for their hand out. Socialism seems inevitable at this point.

A normal life in America is thousands of times better than a normal life anywhere else in the world.

Complete lunacy.
